WORCS checklist

Source: R/worcs_checklist.R
worcs_checklist.Rd

This checklist can be used to see whether a project adheres to the principles of open reproducible code in science, as set out in the WORCS paper.

data(worcs_checklist)

Format

A data frame with 15 rows and 5 variables.

Details

categoryfactorCategory of the checklist element.
namefactorName of the checklist element.
descriptionfactorWhat are the requirements to claim that this checklist element is met?
importancefactorWhether the checklist element is essential to obtain a green 'open science' badge, or optional.
checklogicalWhether the criterion is checked automatically by worcs_badge.

References

Van Lissa, C. J., Brandmaier, A. M., Brinkman, L., Lamprecht, A., Peikert, A., , Struiksma, M. E., & Vreede, B. (2020) <doi:10.17605/OSF.IO/ZCVBS>.
